aircraft.value: Titan Heavy - AC-3348-637 at Maintenance Hub-Y

defect_observed.value: Filter bypass indicator activation. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Flight Control Hydraulics component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications

preventive_action.value: Issue technical bulletin to all operators

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol. Date: 26/08/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 28/08/2024 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 28/08/2024 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Regulatory quality requirements verified. Proposed actions meet airworthiness standards. Recommend approval. Date: 02/09/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 04/09/2024 Signature: Air Cmde R.K. Joshi

Part - III: (Defect Details)

b) Defect Observed: Filter bypass indicator activation. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Electromagnetic interference affecting sensor accuracy
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Flight Control Hydraulics component.
Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications

ii. Preventive Action: Issue technical bulletin to all operators
d) Attributable Code: N1 - Defect confirmed but reason not established
